```{r}
#descargando la base de datos de Belostoma elegans

spp <- (out <- occ(query = "Belostoma elegans*",from = c('gbif','vernet','ecoengine','idigbio','bison'),limit = 20000))

spp2df <- occ2df(out)#to combine occurrences

spp2df_ddply <- ddply(spp2df, c("longitude","latitude"), head, 1)#to delete occurrences without geographic coordinates and coordinates duplicated (same lon and lat for more than one occurrence).

spp2df_ddply<- spp2df_ddply[spp2df_ddply$longitude!="NA"&spp2df_ddply$latitude!="NA",]
spp2df_ddply<- spp2df_ddply[-80,]
  
write.csv(spp2df, "Oileus rimator_df.csv")#write the database with duplicates
write.csv(spp2df_ddply,"Oileus_rimator_df_ddply.csv")#write database without duplicates

```
